Title: Relates to the ability for school districts to implement telehealth school-based mental health clinics
Summary: Grants school districts the ability to implement telehealth school-based mental health clinics; establishes the student mental telehealth reimbursement fund; relates to funding the student mental telehealth reimbursement fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง414, Ed L; amd ยง2999-dd, Pub Health L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L; amd ยง1367, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to the ability for school districts to implement telehealth school-based mental health clinics; to amend the state finance law, in relation to the student mental telehealth reimbursement fund; and to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to funding the student mental telehealth reimbursement fund
